# @afena/cli

## Usage

```bash
pnpm afena
```

### Build

```bash
pnpm build
```

### Development

```bash
pnpm dev
```

| Subpath | Conditions |
|---|---|
| `.` | default: `dist/index.js`, types: `dist/index.d.ts` |

| Script | Command |
|---|---|
| `build` | `tsup` |
| `dev` | `tsup --watch` |
